title: Anyone else get muted for literally nothing?
body:
Not sure where to put this, but like...
It's really awkward when you're trying to offer tips/something and someone just mutes you.
Too many games, there's a feeding player/sensitive guy.
I haven't said anything at all, but the moment I start typing something, Im told that I'm muted. 

Example:
Eve: Hey Yas
Yas: Muted
Eve: Do you want red

I get League's community is toxic, and it's not entirely the other person's fault, but I really wish they'd let me finish my sentence...
{{sticker:sg-ahri-1}}
